item.title: Our Universe could be trapped inside a black hole with no way out - BBC Science Focus Magazine
item.description:
1. Our Universe could be trapped inside a black hole with no way out  BBC Science Focus Magazine
  2. New Physics Model Challenges the Big Bang Story We Thought We Knew  SciTechDaily
  3. It's official—an international study claims that the Big Bang was not the beginning of everything, but rather a “rebound” from a previous universe trapped in a black hole  Blanquivioletas
  4. New Physics model challenges ‘The Big Bang’ scientific theory  Digital Journal
  5. The Big Bang faces its biggest rival — A map points to where the universe began  El Diario 24

item.title: Supermassive black hole spews gas at record speeds, upending mass estimates - Phys.org
item.description:
1. Supermassive black hole spews gas at record speeds, upending mass estimates  Phys.org
